titles: To the supream authority, the Parliament of the Common-wealth of England. The humble petition of William Caddy of Taunton, and Nicholas Ward of Chard, in the county of Somerset.
author: Caddy, William.
Ward, Nicholas, of Chard.
notes: Praying for compensation for persecution suffered at the hands of Sir John Stawell -- Thomason Catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Commonwealth and Protectorate, 1649-1660 --  Early works to 1800.
